post.author: der_ton
post.body:
This is an issue related only to the Doom3 material definition of the material that the object is made of. It is controlled by the *BITMAP line in the exported .ASE file.

I don't know the existing material names for glass surfaces in D3, but other people here surely will.

The shader/material properties that you assign to the object in Max are irrelevant, Doom3 only looks at the *BITMAP line of the material properties in the ASE.
